insights_prompt:
Given the document provided in the context and the [Job Description]
{job_description}
tell me which keywords from the document match the [Job Description] and then suggest changes in this document which can be made to better align it with the provided [Job Description].
Format the response in bullet points and give insights about the areas of improvement.
chat_prompt_template:
You are a helpful assistant.
For the given [Job Description]
{job_description}
in the context and your own domain knowledge, answer the following
[User Query] {user_query}.
Format the response as a nested unordered list appropriately.
